charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard that Maylene
was training up in the mountains, so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ]
decided to go and check it out [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="himself" F="herself" ].
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1101_0200:
Upon arriving, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Maylene and
her Meditite in focused meditation.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0600:
Aw, shucks!
I’m not supposed to talk while
I’m meditating...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_0700:
I guess this is proof I haven’t perfected
it yet. If I can hear voices, it means I’m
not concentrating hard enough.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_0900:
Mm... Do you have to stare at me like that?
You’re ruining my concentration.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_1000:
*sigh*
I suppose me getting flustered means I’m
not concentrating enough in the first place.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1200:
Sorry if that came across as rude! I should be
embarrassed, seeing as how you hiked all the
way up here to see me...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1400:
I don’t really have anything I can serve you
up here, unfortunately, but feel free to
make yourself at home.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1500:
Oh, wait! This might be a good opportunity
for us to train together! What do you
think, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1600:
I was planning on trying out the training
regimen that Meditite always follows,
starting today.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1700:
She has one meal per day—one Berry.
She sleeps for one hour total and spends
about 15 hours in meditation...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_1800:
It sounds pretty tough, but I think it will
be great experience for us in the end!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2000: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2100:
I’m used to sticking to a strict diet.
I’ve been following a pretty tough
training regimen for a while now.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_2200: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2400: It’s fine! I’ve got a lot of self-discipline.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2500:
If I hyper-focus on my training, maybe I won’t
think about my lack of sleep!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_2600: So yes! I’ll be totally fine...I think.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_2700:
Huh? Oh, sorry, Meditite!
You’re getting impatient to start your
training, aren’t you?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3000:
Aw... I think Meditite might be worried about
me following her training regimen.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_3100:
To tell you the truth, I wasn’t really sure
if I could do it to begin with...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0302_3200: I think she’s trying to warn you.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_3400:
She must be worried about me following
her training regimen...
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3500:
You know, maybe I was getting a little
ahead of myself.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3600:
I got a little absorbed in the idea of growing
stronger with my Meditite.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_3700: What do you think I should do now?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0301_3800:
Let’s do some training that’s meant
for Trainers, not Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4200:
I shouldn’t overdo it—I should just start with
what I know, then slowly work my way up
to more challenging training.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4300:
After all, people and Pokémon are different,
so of course they’re going to struggle with
different things.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4400:
Thank you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I think I learned an important lesson today!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_4500:
I’m going to start my new training regimen
with something more reasonable, like climbing
up cliffs and things!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0401_4700:
Uh... Isn’t that something people
can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_0402_4900:
Uh... Isn’t that something people
can’t usually do?
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5000:
It’s fine! If I build up my leg muscles,
I’ll be able to keep going after battle
without getting tired!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2301_1201_5100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], want to go climbing
with me? I bet it’ll be really fun!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0100:
Wow, Maylene! Your Meditite looks like she’s
even more focused than usual!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0200: Yeah, we feel like we need to get stronger.
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0300:
I can totally get that.
Hey! Why don’t we have a Pokémon battle!
We should get stronger if we practice!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_1201_0400: Yeah! That sounds like a great idea!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0101_0100:
All right! We’ll make this battle hot enough to
melt glaciers! Let’s show them how focused we
are, Abomasnow!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0100:
*giggle* Your Meditite’s moves have gotten so
much stronger! Much better than last time!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0200:
Heh heh... It looks like our training paid off,
Meditite!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0400:
*gasp*
She looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0050_00_sumomo/2311_0501_0500:
I’m so happy for you, Meditite!
Let’s keep on doing our best!
